evals.name: orchestrate-content-creation
evals.prompt: I need to create GEO content about 'AI search optimization' but I don't know where to start.
evals.expected_output: Studio recognizes Discover intent, runs geo-prompt-researcher to find target prompts, then chains to geo-citation-writer, geo-structured-writer, geo-human-editor, and geo-schema-gen for complete content creation workflow.
